title: Novus Law, LLC names Sally B. Narey as Chief Operating Officer
text:
Novus Law, LLC
CHICAGO , Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- Novus Law, LLC, a global legal services firm, has named Sally Narey as Chief Operating Officer. Ms. Narey is responsible for leading the firm's client services and technology solutions teams, as well as participating in its strategic development.
"This is an exciting time to join Novus Law," Narey says. "Novus' distinctive processes transform the way in which corporate legal departments and their law firms are able to manage document-intensive matters. With its unique one-touch approach to analyzing documents, Novus is able to quickly share document-related discovery results with its clients at a significant cost savings. As businesses and law firms face increasing pressure to control expenses, working with Novus Law is a smart decision. I'm thrilled to be joining such an innovative organization."
Ms. Narey brings a unique client perspective to Novus Law as the former deputy general counsel and chief legal officer of several major insurance organizations. She is the past Senior Vice President and General Counsel of Fireman's Fund Insurance Company. At Fireman's Fund, she held a wide range of responsibilities, including corporate legal governance, corporate litigation, state government relations, insurance regulatory matters, corporate investigations, ethics, and public policy issues. Under Ms. Narey's leadership, Fireman's Fund received a 2015 ACC Value Champion Award. She has also been recognized for her dedication to the advancement of women lawyers.
Novus Law CEO Raymond Bayley said, "We're delighted that Sally has joined our leadership team. As a former general counsel and senior business executive, she enhances our knowledge of the evolving needs of corporate counsel while strengthening the senior leadership of our firm. As we continue to grow, Sally will ensure that we continue to provide industry-leading services to our clients. She'll also help us continue to innovate and find new and even better ways to serve our clients."
Ms. Narey is the former general counsel of USAA's property and casualty business. She has also held senior legal positions with CNA Financial Corporation, overseeing its staff counsel operations, and the National Council on Compensation Insurance. Ms. Narey received a Bachelor of Arts degree from the University of Iowa and a Juris Doctor from the University of Minnesota.
